entry.em: ..HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING

entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HOT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 107

PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
